title: What Would You Do If Someone Claiming To Be Your Sibling Reached Out?
description:
What would be your response after receiving a message saying, hey, I might be your sister."? In this case, Kristin's friend had no words. But she did reach out to the woman, and they know for certain that she is her actual sister. So what's happened since they reconnected? Kristin tells us...
